directions: Combine pumpkin, potatoes, creamed corn, 2 cans cream of coconut, soy milk, nutritional yeast, turmeric, paprika, thyme, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper in a large pot. Pour in enough boiling water to cover the vegetables. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer until pumpkin and potatoes are soft, 15 to 20 minutes.
Puree soup using an immersion blender adding 1/2 cup cream of coconut if you want the soup creamier.
ingredients: 1 pinch chili powder, or to taste
freshly cracked black pepper to taste
2 cups boiling water, or as needed
title: Vegan Pumpkin Soup with Corn and Coconut
